Class UserSession

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.business.UserSession
@Component @Scope(value="session", proxyMode=TARGET_CLASS) public class UserSession extends Object
Maintains the active user's session data across requests. This version includes a tokenized password representation for display purposes only (never the real password).

    • getPasswordToken

      public String getPasswordToken()
      Gets the masked (tokenized) password value. This is not the user's real password.
      Returns:
      password token (e.g., "********************")

    • setPasswordToken

      public void setPasswordToken(String token)
      Sets the password token (for display only). Typically called after user registration or login.
      Parameters:
      token - masked token (default: "********************")

    • getRole

      public String getRole()
      Gets the role of the current user.
      Returns:
      role (e.g., "CUSTOMER" or "RESTAURANT")

    • setRole

      public void setRole(String role)
      Sets the role of the current user.
      Parameters:
      role - the role to set

    • clear

      @PreDestroy public void clear()
      Clears all session data. Called when user logs out or session ends.
